screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint if self.timerRunning: titleheight = 30 else: titleheight = 0 self.setTitle("") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 76, textsize[1] + 30) wsizex = textsize[0] + 90 wsizey = textsize[1] lenlist = len(self.list)*38 if (lenlist > 380): lenlist = 380 if (96 > wsizey): wsizey = 96 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += lenlist + 15 if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 listwidth = self.getListWidth() + 10 if (listwidth > 1280): listwidth = 1280 if (listwidth > wsizex): wsizex = listwidth wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + titleheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(97, 12 + titleheight)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(7, 7 + titleheight)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(80,80)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(7, 7 + titleheight)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(80,80)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(7, 7 + titleheight)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(80,80)) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (wsizex-6, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(3, wsizey - lenlist + titleheight - 3)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey)/2))

eLabel.text: F i l e l i s t
P l a y l i s t

widget.convert: { "template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (7, 10), size = (525, 45), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (540, 10), size = (322, 45), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1)], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 30)], "itemHeight": 52 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (75, 0), size = (225, 39), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (75, 40), size = (810, 34), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the state MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 2), size = (72, 72), png = 2), # index 2 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 72), size = (825, 3), png = 3), # index 3 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 36), gFont("Regular", 33)], "itemHeight": 75 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (7, 2), size = (660, 42), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (7, 39), size = (660, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (667, 3), size = (72, 72), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (7, 75), size = (765, 3), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 33), gFont("Regular", 21)], "itemHeight": 78 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (15, 9), size = (72, 72), png = 1), # index 1 is the expandable/expanded/verticalline icon MultiContentEntryText(pos = (105, 6), size = (930, 39), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the Hostname MultiContentEntryText(pos = (240, 7), size = (780, 37), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (240, 39), size = (780, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 4 is the sharedescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (37, 9), size = (72, 72), png = 5), # index 5 is the nfs/cifs icon MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (165, 9), size = (72, 72), png = 6), # index 6 is the isMounted icon ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 33), gFont("Regular", 25), gFont("Regular", 36)], "itemHeight": 90 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 7), size = (990, 42), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 2 is the Menu Titel MultiContentEntryText(pos = (105, 52), size = (975, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 3 is the Description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (15, 9), size = (72, 72), png = 3), # index 4 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 33), gFont("Regular", 25)], "itemHeight": 90 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (60, 9), size = (72, 72), png = 0), # index 0 is the isMounted pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (300, 7), size = (300, 42), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (570, 12), size = (375, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the IPdescription MultiContentEntryText(pos = (300, 52), size = (525, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the DIRdescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (975, 22), size = (72, 72), png = 4), # index 4 is the activepng pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (1020, 9), size = (72, 72), png = 5), # index 4 is the mounttype pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 33), gFont("Regular", 25)], "itemHeight": 90 }

{ "templates": { "default": (37, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (52, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 0), size = (90, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (165, 0), size = (180, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (360, 0), size = (300, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (675, 6), size = (22, 37), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (37, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (52, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 0), size = (90, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (165, 0), size = (180, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (360, 0), size = (300, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (675, 6), size = (22, 37), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 30), gFont("Regular", 24)], "itemHeight": 37 }

{ "template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (127, 9), size = (660, 42), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), # index 1 is the interfacename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (127, 64), size = (660, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_BOTTOM, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 26), size = (81, 81), png = 3), # index 3 is the interface pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (84, 38), size = (22, 24), png = 4), # index 4 is the default pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 42), gFont("Regular", 30)], "itemHeight": 105 }
